description: Raiden Shogun and Kujou Sara Banner was here !
Engulfing Lightning Weapon Banner has been added
Now you can wishing on previous banner by clicking (x) button on the top right of the page
Now you can create screenshot and link to share when wishing
Sangonomia Kokomi is ready to pull !
Everlasting Moonglow Weapon Banner has been added

Add more previous banner, Eula, Zhongli, Tartaglia/Childe, Albedo, Ganyu, Xiao, Hu Tao, Venti is ready to pull !
Click (x) button on the top right of the page to change the banner
Polar Star Weapon Banner has been added
Hu Tao Character Banner has been added !
Staff of Homma & Elegy for The End Weapon Banner has been added
Freedom Sworn & Song of Broken Pines Weapon Banner has been added

if you find any error, follow this steps to reset browser cache specialy only for WIsh Simulator Site . Open Inpect ELement ( CTRL + Shift i ) -> Application -> Storage -> Click on "Clear Site Data" Button
Ignore the steps above if this is the first time you visit this site or if you already do reset
Arrataki Itto character Banner is ready to pull
Redhorn Stonethresher Weapon Banner has been added !
Implement Epitomized Path System to Weapon Banner for patch 2.0 and above
Now you can pull Shenhe and Yunjin the Best Waifu!
Gong Xi Fa Cai. Wish you luck on Lantern Rite event
Zhongli and Ganyu Rerun Banner Already out here !
Vortex and Amos Weapon Rerun Banner is ready to pull too !
Now you can pull without worry about running out of fate, just activate the Unlimited Fates Option in Menu by clicking the (?) button on top of the page
Event Banner Updated, Now you can pull Yae Miko here !
Yae Miko signature Weapon, Kagura's Verity is ready to pull too !
Inventory Updated, Now You can show all Characters and Weapons both you already got or not
Raiden Shogun Rerun Banner was here !
Sangonomia Kokomi is ready to pull too!
Weapon Banner Updated, Engulfing Lightning and Everlasting Moonglow already added

Due to high number of visitors, Our monthly bandwidth also increased. We need to upgrade the hosting plan to keep this site alive. So We'll show some ads on this site.
We're sorry to you, actually we don't want to ruin your wishing experience. If you feel annoyed with ads, feel free to use Ad blocker, we will not forbit you
Or for other solution, you can join membership here to get opportunity to use Simulator without ads!
Venti is ready to pull too!
Weapon Banner Updated, Haran Geppaku Futsu and Elegy for the End already added
Kamisato Ayaka Rerun Banner already out !
Weapon Banner Updated, Mistsplitter Reforged and The Unforged was here too!

We recently had to migrate our server for other reasons, so the old wishing histories isn't being tracked on the new server, We apologize for the inconvenience. We hope it doesn't happen again in the future, so you can enjoy the simulator peacefully
Weapon Banner Updated, Aqua Simulacra and Primordial Jade Winged Spear are ready to pull !
Arataki Itto Rerun Banner was here !
Weapon Banner Updated, Redhorn Stonesthresher and Memory of Dust are ready to pull too!
New!!! Now you can purchase Character's Outfit in the shop. You also can set the costume splash art as result of your wish if you want :D
New!!! Now Blessing of the Welkin Moon is available to purchase
Kazuha 2nd Rerun and Klee 3rd Rerun Banner was here !
Weapon Banner Updated, Freedom Sworn and Lost Prayers to the Sacred Winds are ready to pull too!
New Outfit released! Red Dead of Night for Diluc and Ein Immernachtstraum for Fischl, purchasable on shop.
Translation Features is live now, But only EN, RU CN-Simplified and ID are available for now, if You want to contribute to add more translation, please go to Github Repository
Weapon Banner Updated, Thundering Pulse and Summit Shaper are ready to pull too !
Tighnari Banner already out, with new 4‚òÖ Character "Collei"
Weapon Banner Updated, Hunter's Path and Vortex Vanquisher are ready to pull too !
Kokomi 3rd Rerun and Ganyu 3rd Rerun Banner already out !
Weapon Banner Updated, Amos Bow and Everlasting Moonglow are ready to pull too !
Cyno and Venti 4th Rerun Banners already out, with new 4‚òÖ Character "Candace"
Weapon Banner Updated, Staff of the Scarlet Sands and Elegy for The End are ready to pull too !
Now you can obtain Tighnari when you lose 50:50 or when you pull Standard Banner starts from version 3.1
Nilou and Albedo 3rd Rerun Banners already out
Weapon Banner Updated, Key of Khaj-Nisut and Primordial Jade Cutter are ready to pull too !
New 4‚òÖ Sumeru Weapon Series: Xiphos' Moonlight and Wandering Evenstar
New Character Nahida and Yoimiya 3rd Rerun Banners already out
Weapon Banner Updated, A Thousand Floating Dreams and Thundering Pulse are ready to pull too !
Yae Miko 2nd Rerun and Tartaglia 3rd Rerun Banners are ready
Weapon Banner Updated, Kagura's Verity and Polar Star are ready to pull too !

I'm happy to announce that WishSimulator.App already listed on Google Play Store!!! You can get it here
But actually I still prefer to use and install directly from this web. It's literally use the same technology. I'm not sure You'll feel the difference

New Feature: Now you can Customize the Probabilities and Control how many roll in one multi
New Feature: Hotkeys/Shortcut have been added, Try to press [ENTER] to "Wish" or "Confirm" and [ESC] to "Skip", "Cancel" or "Close". More Hotkeys will be added in the future
